parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Shows object defined in global config in CfgTitles

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''titleObj''' [class, type, speed, showInMap]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [class, type, speed, showInMap]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> class: [[String]] - defined in <tt>[[configFile]] >> "CfgTitles" >> class</tt>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> type: [[String]] one of "PLAIN", "PLAIN DOWN", "BLACK", "BLACK FADED", "BLACK OUT", "BLACK IN", "WHITE OUT" and "WHITE IN". See [[Title Effect Type]]s for more information about these values.
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> speed (Optional): [[Number]] - Time in seconds to fade in resource. Default: -1
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> showInMap (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[false]] to hide the text when the map is opened. Default: [[true]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[titleObj]] ["BISLogo", "PLAIN"]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[titleText]], [[titleRsc]], [[cutRsc]], [[cutObj]], [[cutText]], [[allActiveTitleEffects]]
</value></part></template>
